body_html:
Same here.

In
saver = tf.train.Saver(max_to_keep=1)
...
saver.save(sess, result_path + "/model.ckpt", global_step=save_num, write_meta_graph=False)
The '/' before model.ckpt makes the difference whether my 1 Terrabyte quota is exhausted over night or not. Both on Ubuntu 14 and Scientific Linux 7.

body:
Same here.

In 
`
saver = tf.train.Saver(max_to_keep=1)
`
...
`
saver.save(sess, result_path + "/model.ckpt", global_step=save_num, write_meta_graph=False)
`
The '/' before model.ckpt makes the difference whether my 1 Terrabyte quota is exhausted over night or not. Both on Ubuntu 14 and Scientific Linux 7.
